youtube.title: How a Colostomy Bag Works: Medical Procedure Explained
youtube.description: Learn the science behind why people use colostomy bags. This video explains the surgical process of creating a stoma and how it assists the digestive system when natural functions are compromised. Essential biology and medical knowledge simplified.
